page.title: 20SCHOOLS, SUTTON, SURREY.
page.content:
Schools participating in the Domesday Survey All Saints' Primary Avenue Primary Barrow Hedges Primary Camden Junior Stanley Park Junior Nonsuch High St. Philomena's
Sutton is one of the few Education Authorities that still retain the ll+ exam. Tests are taken in the Autumn Term of the last year at Primary School. The two secondary schools listed represent a girls' selective school and a girls' Comprehensive Catholic School. There are both mixed and single sex schools at Secondary level.
